abstract: The scale of the avalanche disaster in Pakistan could well renew a debate about the costly deployments of Indian and Pakistani military units on the Siachen Glacier, a place so high, cold and forbidding that it is sometimes called "the third pole." Leaders from both countries met Sunday in New Delhi, with the glacier as a possible talking point.

headline.main: A Chance to Unfreeze the Standoff on the Glacier
